description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are preparing for a teaching career. Eligibility Requirements Must be an education major, with intent to become a teacher Must be a female student admitted to student teaching 2.75 GPA or higher Must be in student teaching semester Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Seniors graduating in December are eligible to receive full scholarship in their last semester Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
